cli_entry_points.name: cli.py
cli_entry_points.description: Universal Tool & Workflow Router. The primary interface for Tool Discovery and Workflow Execution.

agent-scaffolders.name: audit.py

documentation.name: capture_code_snapshot.py
documentation.description: Generates a single text file snapshot of code files for LLM context sharing. Direct Python port of the legacy Node.js utility.

investigate.name: test_infrastructure.py
investigate.description: Purpose: Verifies the Hybrid Discovery Tooling (Method A/B/C) on sample artifacts.

root.name: audit_plugins.py
root.description: Audits the Tool Inventory against the file system and RLM Cache. Checks for missing scripts, orphan entries, and RLM coverage gaps in the plugins/ directory.

root.name: bridge_installer.py
root.description: Installs a specific Agent Plugin (.claude-plugin structure) into target environments (Antigravity, GitHub Copilot, Gemini, Claude). Handles content transformation (actor swapping) and file placement.

root.name: cleanup_cache.py
root.description: Removes stale or orphan entries from the RLM Cache and Tool Inventory when files are deleted or moved. Ensures cache hygiene.

root.name: cli.py
root.description: Universal Tool & Workflow Router. The primary interface for Tool Discovery and Workflow Execution.

context-bundler.name: distiller.py
context-bundler.description: The RLM Engine. Performs recursive summarization of repository content using Ollama (or injected summaries). Updates the RLM Cache and triggers inventory updates.

context-bundler.name: env_helper.py
context-bundler.description: Simple environment variable helper with proper fallback (Env -> .env). Ensures consistent secret loading across Project Sanctuary.

link-checker.name: hf_decorate_readme.py
link-checker.description: Prepares the local Hugging Face staging directory for upload. Modifies 'hugging_face_dataset_repo/README.md' in-place with YAML frontmatter per ADR 081.

link-checker.name: install_all_plugins.py
link-checker.description: Bulk Plugin Installer that iterates through all directories in plugins/ and executes the bridge_installer.py for each, ensuring a full installation of all available plugins.

link-checker.name: inventory.py
link-checker.description: Interactive CLI for browsing and managing the Tool Inventory. Provides a user-friendly menu for listing, searching, and updating tools.

link-checker.name: manage_tool_inventory.py
link-checker.description: Comprehensive manager for Tool Inventories. Supports list, add, update, remove, search, audit, discovery, and documentation generation for tools.

link-checker.name: query_cache.py
link-checker.description: Provides instant O(1) semantic search of the RLM ledger. Allows searching by term, listing cached files, and outputting results in JSON.

link-checker.name: rebuild_inventory.py
link-checker.description: Complete rebuild of the Tool Inventory from the file system. Scans plugins/ and tools/ to generate a fresh tool_inventory.json, handling categories and descriptions.

link-checker.name: rlm_config.py
link-checker.description: Centralized configuration and utility logic for the RLM Toolchain. Implements the Manifest Factory pattern to dynamically resolve manifests and cache files.

plugin-manager.name: speckit_system_bridge.py
plugin-manager.description: The Universal Bridge Synchronization Engine. Reads Spec Kitty definitions from .windsurf/workflows and .kittify/memory (Source of Truth) and projects them into native configurations for Antigravity, Claude, Gemini, and GitHub Copilot.

plugin-manager.name: sync_inventory_descriptions.py
plugin-manager.description: Backfills Tool Inventory descriptions using high-quality purpose fields from the RLM Cache. Hydrates manual inventory with LLM-generated insights.

plugin-manager.name: sync_skills.py
plugin-manager.description: Synchronizes skill directories from .agent/skills/ to the native skill locations expected by each AI agent (Claude, Copilot). Also handles cleanup of old injected blocks in config files.

plugin-manager.name: sync_workflows.py
plugin-manager.description: Synchronizes custom workflow definitions from .agent/workflows/ to other agent configuration directories (Claude, Copilot, Gemini). Handles format conversions (e.g., Markdown to TOML for Gemini).

plugin-manager.name: task_manager.py
plugin-manager.description: Manages tasks and kanban boards for Project Sanctuary. Supports creating, moving, and listing tasks, as well as generating board visualizations.

plugin-manager.name: tool_chroma.py
plugin-manager.description: Embedded ChromaDB wrapper for tool-inventory plugin. Provides a dedicated vector store for tool discovery and semantic search over tool summaries without external dependencies.

plugin-manager.name: upload_to_huggingface.py
plugin-manager.description: Manages the upload of model weights, GGUF files, and metadata to Hugging Face Hub (Phase 6). Handles artifact selection, repo creation, and secure transport.

plugin-manager.name: cleanup_targets.py
verify_bridge_integrity.py
plugin-manager.description: Audits the Universal Bridge Synchronization by verifying that artifacts from the Source of Truth (.windsurf, .kittify) are correctly projected into target agent directories (.agent, .claude, .gemini, .github). Checks for file existence and content transformations.

plugin-manager.name: verify_links.py
plugin-manager.description: Verifies the integrity of internal links across the documentation base. Part of Protocol 128 validation.

rlm-factory.name: verify_workflow_state.py
rlm-factory.description: Validates that valid Spec-Driven Development (SDD) artifacts (spec.md, plan.md, tasks.md) exist and are in the correct state for a given phase (specify, plan, tasks, review).

rlm-factory.name: workflow_inventory_manager.py
rlm-factory.description: Manages the workflow inventory for agent workflows (.agent/workflows/*.md). Scans workflow files, extracts frontmatter, generates JSON/Markdown inventories, and supports search/list operations.

tool-inventory.name: tool_chroma.py
tool-inventory.description: tool_chroma.py â€” Embedded ChromaDB wrapper for tool-inventory plugin

vector-db.name: operations.py
vector-db.description: Core domain logic for Vector DB operations.

vector-db.name: vector_config.py
vector-db.description: Wraps the raw manifest JSON dict and provides file discovery methods.
